mapper.select: SELECT BBS_NO, USER_ID, BBS_TITLE, BBS_CONTENT, BBS_IP, BBS_CREATE_DATE, BBS_HIT FROM BBS
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BBS (BBS_NO, USER_ID, BBS_TITLE, BBS_CONTENT, BBS_IP, BBS_CREATE_DATE, BBS_HIT) VALUES (BBS_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{bbsTitle}, #{bbsContent}, #{bbsIp}, SYSTIMESTAMP, 0)
